notes.logistics: Biology-only Online Science Bowl invitational, similar to Earth and Space Scrimmage. Open to high school and college alumni. Overall difficulty expected to vary widely. Tournament date may be pushed back but won't be pushed forward.

format.summary: Biology-only Science Bowl tournament with 24 teams. Format to be officially announced by January 1st.

registration.instructions: Interest form is currently open. Official registration opens January 1st. Team composition (individuals, duos, or trios) depends on how many people show interest. Format will be officially announced when registrations open.
